snippet: Office Depot said on Tuesday that it would close at least 400 stores because its merger with OfficeMax resulted in overlapping locations.
abstract: Office Depot says it will close at least 400 stores ahead of its $1.2 billion merger with OfficeMax, due to overlapping locations.
lead_paragraph: Office Depot said on Tuesday that it would close at least 400 stores because its merger with OfficeMax resulted in overlapping locations.

headline.main: Office Depot Plans to Close 400 Stores After Merger
headline.print_headline: Office Depot Plans to Close 400 Stores After Merger
